meanings.definition: A diagnostic imaging technique used to visualize the kidneys and urinary tract.
meanings.sent1: The doctor ordered a pyelogram to check my kidneys.
meanings.sent2: The pyelogram showed a blockage in the urinary tract.
meanings.sent3: During the pyelogram, the kidneys seemed to wave hello on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her kidneys appeared on the pyelogram like two beans in a pod.
meanings.sent5: The pyelogram captured the inner workings of the kidneys in great detail.

meanings.definition: The resulting image produced by a pyelogram.
meanings.sent1: The technician handed me the pyelogram to take to the doctor.
meanings.sent2: The pyelogram displayed a clear picture of the kidneys.
meanings.sent3: I framed the pyelogram and hung it on the wall as modern art.
meanings.sent4: The pyelogram was as revealing as a secret diary.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the pyelogram were as vibrant as a rainbow.
